text: Polyalthia lancilimba is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to China.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Polyalthia lancilimba. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== Category:Flora of China lancilimba Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Polyalthia lancilimba
